en:
亮光蜡
(Liàngguāng là)

Light wax

Translations of 亮光蜡
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

亮光
    Light, Shine, Bright, Bright light, Gloss
蜡
    wax, candle, the wax, a wax, of wax
